config.trailmix.cat.potionEffect.name: Potion Effect
config.trailmix.cat.clientOnly.name: Client Only
config.trailmix.cat.potionEffect.comment: Settings related to the Trail Mix potion effect
config.trailmix.cat.clientOnly.comment: These settings affect only the client that installs the mod.
config.trailmix.prop.potID.name: Potion ID for Trail Mix
config.trailmix.prop.potFireball.name: Fireball Skill
config.trailmix.prop.potFireballUse.name: Fireball Potion Use
config.trailmix.prop.potDuration.name: Duration of trail mix
config.trailmix.prop.potPoisoning.name: Trail mix overdose amount
config.trailmix.prop.potSpeed.name: Walk speed multiplier
config.trailmix.prop.fallDampening.name: Fall Dampening
config.trailmix.prop.pigExplosion.name: Pig explosion affects blocks
config.trailmix.prop.horseClearZone.name: Horse block clearing
config.trailmix.prop.horseFireTrail.name: Horse fire trail
config.trailmix.prop.replaceRender.name: Replace Pig Renderer
config.trailmix.prop.fireballKey.name: Fireball Key
config.trailmix.prop.pitchUpKey.name: Pitch Up Key
config.trailmix.prop.pitchDownKey.name: Pitch Down Key
config.trailmix.prop.strafeLeftKey.name: Turn Left Key
config.trailmix.prop.strafeRightKey.name: Turn Right Key
config.trailmix.prop.speedUpKey.name: Speed Up Key
config.trailmix.prop.speedDownKey.name: Slow Down Key
config.trailmix.prop.tightTurnKey.name: Tight Turn Key
config.trailmix.prop.potID.comment:
The ID for the potion effect.
0 = Auto take first available slot
config.trailmix.prop.potFireballUse.comm: Time from effect used when firing a fireball (in ticks)
config.trailmix.prop.potFireballMinReq.c: Minimum Trail Mix effect time required to launch fireballs (in ticks)
config.trailmix.prop.potDuration.comment: Duration of each trail mix eaten (in ticks)
config.trailmix.prop.potPoisoning.commen:
How much can you take before overdosing (in ticks)
Set to 0 to disable
config.trailmix.prop.fallDampening.comme:
Dampen fall damage?
Fall damage / (This value + 1)
config.trailmix.prop.pigExplosion.commen:
Do pig explosions damage blocks?
0 = No
1 = Yes
2 = World Game Rules
config.trailmix.prop.horseClearZone.comm:
Do horses clear the area while running on trail mix?
0 = No
1 = Yes
2 = World Game Rules
config.trailmix.prop.horseFireTrail.comm: Do horses leave a trail of fire while running on trail mix?
config.trailmix.prop.explosionBubble.com: Enable the explosion bubble effects when hitting mobs?
config.trailmix.prop.showFlightTimer.com: Show the time remaining on flight?
config.trailmix.prop.replaceRender.comme:
Replace pig render with custom render?
If you have issues with invisible pigs etc, disable this.
config.trailmix.prop.pitchUpKey.comment: Key to pitch upwards while on a trail mix pig
config.trailmix.prop.pitchDownKey.commen: Key to pitch downwards while on a trail mix pig
config.trailmix.prop.strafeLeftKey.comme: Key to turn left while on a trail mix pig
config.trailmix.prop.strafeRightKey.comm: Key to turn right while on a trail mix pig
config.trailmix.prop.speedUpKey.comment: Key to speed up while on a trail mix pig
config.trailmix.prop.speedDownKey.commen: Key to slow down while on a trail mix pig
config.trailmix.prop.tightTurnKey.commen: Key to make tight turns while on a trail mix pig
